title: Quantum Entanglement in High School Labs
abstract: A practical guide to demonstrating basic entanglement concepts using accessible materials.

title: Soil Microbiome Diversity Across Urban Gardens
abstract: Comparative analysis of microbial diversity in soils from different urban green spaces.

title: Optimizing Solar Panel Angles in Lahore
abstract: An empirical study on seasonal tilt optimization for rooftop installations.

title: Machine Learning for School Attendance Prediction
abstract: Evaluates models to predict student attendance using anonymized academic data.

title: Low-cost Spectrometer Build and Calibration
abstract: Design and calibration of a DIY spectrometer using a smartphone camera.
